Package util

Class SimpleStringFuture

java.lang.Object
util.SimpleStringFuture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Future<String>
public class SimpleStringFuture extends Object implements Future<String>
A very lightweight, thread-safe implementation of Future for a single String result.

Supports setting a value exactly once or cancelling the future. Provides blocking get() methods but no chaining or async execution like CompletableFuture.

      Waits if necessary for at most the given time for the computation to complete, and then retrieves the result.
      Specified by:

      the computed string value
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the current thread was interrupted while waiting
